question:
Which of the following rulers founded the new city of Vidyanagar?
1) Harihara I
2) Bukka Raya I
3) Deva Raya I
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sangama dynasty was founded by two brothers Harihara and Bukka in 1336 CE. they ruled the Sangama dynasty from 1336 CE to 1377 CE. They alsoÂ founded a new city of Vidyanagar or Vijayanagara (meaning city of victory) on the south bank of river Tungabhadra.
